mapper.insert: insert into HTY_FCT_PROD_ALL_ORG (STAT_DAY, ORG_CODE, ORG_FNAME, PROD_NUM, PROD_NUM_DOWN, PROD_NUM_SALE, PROD_NUM_BX, PROD_NUM_QY, PROD_NUM_WK, PROD_NUM_DOWN_WK, PROD_NUM_SALE_WK, PROD_NUM_BX_WK, PROD_NUM_QY_WK, PROD_CODE, PROD_FNAME, PP_CODE, PP_NAME, PL_CODE_LV1, PL_NAME_LV1, PL_CODE_LV2, PL_NAME_LV2, PL_CODE_LV3, PL_NAME_LV3, SALE_FLAG, SALE_AMT_YEAR, SALE_QVT_YEAR, SALE_AMT_ALL, SALE_AVG) values (#{statDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumDown,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumSale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumBx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumQy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumWk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumDownWk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumSaleWk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumBxWk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodNumQyWk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodFname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCodeLv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plNameLv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCodeLv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plNameLv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCodeLv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plNameLv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleAmtYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleQvtYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleAmtAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleAvg,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
